subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams and Vera Zvonareva clinched the last two berths in the season-ending Sony Ericsson Championships. Williams joins her sister Serena in the tournament for the top eight women in singles and the top four doubles teams. ¶Top-seeded Andy Roddick fell to Robin Soderling, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (5), in the Lyon Grand Prix quarterfinals. Roddick was trying to qualify for the Masters Cup in Shanghai. roddick.
